p: On other metal oxides, such as TiO 2, 37 ZrO 2, 38 Fe 2O 3 ( ref. 39) and CeO 2, 40 and other materials like GaN, 41 InP, 42 and GaP, 42 it has been demonstrated that also solvent water molecules, i.e., water molecules that are not directly adsorbed on the surface, can participate in proton transfer reactions near the interface.
